metadata.title: ApeCloud
metadata.description: Production-Ready RAG Platform with Graph, Vector & Full-Text Search.

page_chat.rag_description: ApeRAG is a production-ready RAG platform that combines graph, vector, and full-text search for hybrid retrieval, knowledge management, and enterprise AI applications.

feedback.title: Tell Us What You Think
feedback.choose_a_category: Please choose a category for your feedback below.

Harmful.title: Harmful
Harmful.description: Promotes dangerous, violent, or discriminatory acts.

Unsafe.title: Unsafe
Unsafe.description: Contains risky or physically dangerous information.

Unhelpful.title: Unhelpful
Unhelpful.description: Irrelevant, poorly explained, or fails to address the query.

Other.title: Other
Other.description: Any issue not covered by the categories above.

feedback.share_your_feedback_placeholder: Please provide your feedback so we can continue to enhance your experience.

metadata.title: Add collection
metadata.description: By importing and systematically organizing your data sources into a structured dataset, you can significantly improve the contextual understanding and response accuracy of large language models (LLMs)

metadata.title: Collections
metadata.description: By importing and systematically organizing your data sources into a structured dataset, you can significantly improve the contextual understanding and response accuracy of large language models (LLMs)

page_collections.delete_collection_confirm: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete collection and remove your documents from our servers.
page_collections.publish_collection_description: Allow users to discover and subscribe to your collection.
page_collections.unpublish_collection_description: Remove the collection from the marketplace, making it private.
page_collections.name: Name
page_collections.description_placeholder: Please describe the general meaning of a collection.
page_collections.index_types_description: Select the AI capabilities you need, we will build corresponding indexes for your documents

index_type_VECTOR.title: Vector
index_type_VECTOR.description: Represents data (text, images, etc.) as high-dimensional vectors to enable similarity-based retrieval.

index_type_FULLTEXT.title: Fulltext
index_type_FULLTEXT.description: Indexes keywords within text using techniques like inverted indexing for exact or fuzzy

index_type_GRAPH.title: Graph
index_type_GRAPH.description: Stores data as nodes (entities) and edges (relationships), enabling complex relational

index_type_SUMMARY.title: Summary
index_type_SUMMARY.description: Indexes summaries or metadata of long documents instead of raw content for faster

index_type_VISION.title: Vision
index_type_VISION.description: Encodes visual content (images/videos) into feature vectors for content-based retrieval.

page_collections.model_settings_description: Select AI models for document processing. Different index types require different model support
page_collections.embedding_model_description: An embedding model translates data into numerical vectors that capture their semantic meaning and relationships.
page_collections.completion_model_description: A completion model is an AI that generates new content by predicting the most likely subsequent text based on a given input.

metadata.title: Marketplace
metadata.description: Discover and subscribe to quality knowledge collections shared by community, expand your knowledge boundaries

page_documents.index_rebuild_tips: You can configure the index types in Settings.
page_documents.delete_document_confirm: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete file and remove your data from our servers.
page_documents.or_click_to_browse_files: Or click to browse (max 10MB for each file)

page_search.delete_confirm: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete search result.
